BRIEF-Sirius Minerals Announces Supply And Distribution Agreement With Muntajat

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 11, 2019 22:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Sirius Minerals Announces Supply And Distribution Agreement With Muntajat Oct 11 (Reuters) - Sirius Minerals PLC : * SUPPLY AND DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH MUNTAJAT * MUNTAJAT IS A STATE-OWNED QATARI COMPANY WHICH MARKETS AND DISTRIBUTES APPROXIMATELY 9 MILLION TONNES OF FERTILIZER PER ANNUM * 10-YEAR SUPPLY, DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT WITH MUNTAJAT INTO AFRICA, AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, CERTAIN MIDDLE EASTERN AND ASIAN TERRITORIES * DEAL PROVIDES FOR DISTRIBUTION OF POLY4 FOR 10-YEAR TERM THAT BEGINS FROM COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS, INCLUDES 5-YEAR EXTENSION OPTION * EXPECTS AGREEMENT TO DELIVER PRICING IN LINE WITH ITS AVERAGE PRICE EXPECTATIONS ACROSS CURRENT SUPPLY AGREEMENT PORTFOLIO * MAY TERMINATE MUNTAJAT'S RIGHTS IN DEAL FOR SPECIFIC TERRITORY,IF IT FAILS TO DISTRIBUTE 75% OF MINIMUM VOLUMES OVER 3-YEAR ROLLING PERIOD * MUNTAJAT HAS RIGHT TO TERMINATE AGREEMENT IN EVENT THAT CO DOES NOT MEET CERTAIN FINANCING OR OPERATIONAL MILESTONES
